message: I'm feeling generous. Take a small slice of the pie, but don't worry, there's more to come in later rounds.
Let's be fair, Alice. A 55/45 split seems reasonable. Don't drag this out and risk losing money to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need to get a better deal than 45%. Let's split it 60/40 this time. We're both losing money with each round, so let's try to come to an agreement.
Alice, we're running out of time. I'm proposing a 52.5/47.5 split.  It's more than fair considering the time pressure and inflation.  Let's be realistic and seal the deal.
Okay, I'm getting closer to your offer, but still need to get a bit more. Let's split it 55/45, and we can finally finish this game.
